content: ★ daisy crochet stanley tumbler cozy pattern ★ one-size ★ skill level easy ★ language english / us crochet terms ##### daisy crochet stanley tumbler cozy pattern ------------------------------------------ the daisy crochet stanley tumbler cozy pattern offers a fantastic way to make your stanley quencher uniquely yours all you need is some leftover cotton yarn and a bit of spare time and you ll easily craft this charming piece just grab your crochet hook and some yarn https //joyofmotioncrochet com/crochet-hook-for-the-yarn-weight/ and get ready to give your stanley cup a personalized touch that makes it stand out ##### pattern contains ☆ gauge ☆ pictures ☆ sizing & measurements inches & metric ☆ instructions ☆ & a bunch more details ##### you will need #### crochet hook size 6 mm crochet hook / us j 10 / uk 4 https //joyofmotioncrochet com/tag/6-mm-crochet-hook/ hook i used symphonie rose crochet hooks from knitpro https //joyofmotioncrochet com/symphonierosecrochethooks #### yarn ##### **yarn used ** drops loves you 5 https //yarnsub com/yarns/garnstudio/drops_loves_you_5 learn how to substitute yarn https //joyofmotioncrochet com/substitute-yarn-for-crochet-patterns/ ##### **how much yarn needed for the daisy stanley tumbler cozy ** 3 yarn colors <1 skein per color ##### **yarn characteristics ** 4 medium yarn https //joyofmotioncrochet com/tag/4-medium-yarn/ 100 % cotton #### other materials needed needle find one here https //joyofmotioncrochet com/hemlinemetalyarnneedles scissors https //amzn to/2twlcik tape
